results.title: Simvastatin: pharmacological response in experimental hyperfibrinogenaemias.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ (0.035 mg/kg) was administered orally to the 30-day @<m>DISEASE_Multiple_Trauma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009104 @@@multiple injuries@@@ group after the third injury for a period of 10 days.

citations.NLM: Moya M, Campana V, Gavotto A, Spitale L, Simes J, Palma J. Simvastatin: pharmacological response in experimental hyperfibrinogenaemias. Acta Cardiol. 2005 Apr;60(2):159-64. PMID: 15887471
